Author: Lunar_Heart
Text: I think it's caused by the gagging. I'm a hands-free purger now, but before that, I always got teary-eyed when purging. I tend to tear up when choking on anything.

Author: fishysandwich
Text: Yeah, I do that. I think it's because you're straining your facial muscles extremely.  Purging is pretty traumatic to the body and my body was in its worse shape when I went through my purging phase.
